actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Staff Sergeant Charles Raymond Stewart and Cynthia M. Stewart of Anchorage, Alaska, and their minor son, Jeff Christopher Stewart.

summary.text: Grants the U.S. District Court for Alaska jurisdiction to hear a claim brought by two named individuals for damages for injury to their minor son arising out of alleged improper diagnosis or medical treatment by Federal physicians and medical personnel at Ramstein Air Base near Kaiserslautern, Germany.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Staff Sergeant Charles Raymond Stewart and Cynthia M. Stewart of Anchorage, Alaska, and their minor son, Jeff Christopher Stewart.
